articles.title: WAKE-UP! Early risers can beat the risk of diabetes and heart disease even if they are battling obesity: Study - Times Now
articles.description: Even if one is obese but hits peak activity in the earlier part of the day by rising early every day, he or she can hope to keep diabetes and cardiovascular diseases at bay. How do you become an early riser?
articles.content: • A study has found that obese people with a pattern of later waking and peak activity later in the day are more likely to develop type 2 diabetes and cardiovascular disease.
